configuration:
mapreduce.framework.name yarn
mapreduce.jobhistory.webapp.address {{ salt['mine.get']('G@stack_id:' ~ grains.stack_id ~ ' and G@roles:cdh5.hadoop.namenode', 'grains.items', 'compound').values()[0]['fqdn'] }}:19888
mapreduce.jobhistory.address {{ salt['mine.get']('G@stack_id:' ~ grains.stack_id ~ ' and G@roles:cdh5.hadoop.namenode', 'grains.items', 'compound').values()[0]['fqdn'] }}:10020
yarn.app.mapreduce.am.staging-dir /user
mapreduce.job.counters.limit 240
mapred.reduce.tasks {{ pillar.cdh5.mapred.reduce_tasks }}
mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress true
mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress.type BLOCK
mapreduce.map.output.compress true
mapreduce.reduce.speculative false
mapreduce.map.output.compress.codec org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec
mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.input.buffer.percent 0.4
jobtracker.thrift.address 0.0.0.0:9290
mapred.jobtracker.plugins org.apache.hadoop.thriftfs.ThriftJobTrackerPlugin Comma-separated list of jobtracker plug-ins to be activated.
mapreduce.map.java.opts -Xmx2000m
mapreduce.map.memory.mb 3000
mapreduce.reduce.java.opts -Xmx2000m
mapreduce.reduce.memory.mb 3000
{% if salt['pillar.get']('cdh5:security:enable', False) %} {% from 'krb5/settings.sls' import krb5 with context %}
mapreduce.jobhistory.keytab /etc/hadoop/conf/mapred.keytab
mapreduce.jobhistory.principal mapred/{{ grains.fqdn }}@{{ krb5.realm }}
{% endif %}
